Package net.kyori.adventure.text.format

Enum TextDecoration

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<TextDecoration>
net.kyori.adventure.text.format.TextDecoration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<TextDecoration>, ComponentBuilderApplicable, StyleBuilderApplicable, TextFormat
public enum TextDecoration extends Enum<TextDecoration> implements StyleBuilderApplicable, TextFormat
An enumeration of decorations which may be applied to a Component.
Since:
4.0.0

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    BOLD
    A decoration which makes text appear bold.
    ITALIC
    A decoration which makes text appear in italics.
    OBFUSCATED
    A decoration which makes text obfuscated/unreadable.
    STRIKETHROUGH
    A decoration which makes text have a strike through it.
    UNDERLINED
    A decoration which makes text have an underline.
